p: Initial identification of novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in Wuhan was alerted by the ophthalmologist by name Li Wenliang and after the enquiry of reporting unusual cases of pneumonia by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission geared up the panic in public. Though it was believed to be linked with Wuhan Huanan seafood wholesale market initially, now it is spread to more than 166 countries in the world, and it was declared as pandemic by WHO. Whole landscape of the disease has changed from epidemic to pandemic in just 45Â days. Worldwide, 191,127 confirmed cases and 7807 deaths were reported as on March 18, 2020, indicating serious global public health concern ( https://www.who.int/docs/default-source/coronaviruse/situation-reports/20200318-sitrep-58-covid-19.pdf?sfvrsn=20876712_2). Situational awareness in all levels for risk management is badly required to contain the spread of this deadly disease.
